CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi is a very fluent reader. context notes say that Mot and Chi sit on the couch together. Chi holds the book. Mot helps hold the book down. Chi's reaction to all the foods the caterpillar eats is <ugh ahh>. Chi uses finger to move along the text occassionally. Before Chi starts reading , there is a lot of page turning and setting up

u.a: MOT points to the word big and Chi gets it right
